titleStmt.title: At Theobalds, the 12. of Aprill 1622. The copy of a reference from the Kings most excellent Maiesty: as also a letter from the right honourable lords of His Maiesties most honourable Priuy Councell, to the most reuerend fathers in God, the lords arch-bishops of Canterbury and Yorke their graces.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I).
Whitbourne, Richard, 1561-1635.

notesStmt.note: The king's grant of copyright for 21 years to Richard Whitbourne to print and sell his book, and reference for raising money. Also includes Whitbourne's letter naming supporters of his ventures into the colonies of North America, and the profits to be derived from trade to those parts.
Place and publisher suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
